result.title: General problem when learning something
result.content: Hello everyone,after few months in CP.I have realized some flaws in me.Whenever I try to learn something I face difficulty in converting pseudo code into working code in language(say C++).It is not that i don't know C++.I have decent knowledge.But when it comes to converting what I have learnt I face difficulty.I always search for exact code which I feel comfortable and because of this Many thing I get deprived off.It will be really helpful if anybody could guide me.Thanks
